Instance Method# min()

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
func min() -> Optional<Publishers.Sequence<Elements, Failure>.Output>.Publisher
```

Available when `Elements` conforms to `Sequence`, `Failure` is `Never`, and `Elements.Element` conforms to `Comparable`.## [See Also](/documentation/Combine/Publishers/Sequence/min()#see-also)
